alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cameron, southwestern Acadia and northwestern Vermilion Parishes through 845 PM CDT... At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crowley to near Klondike. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crowley, Kaplan, Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Mermentau, Klondike, Morse, Riceville, Wright, Egan, Lyons Point, Estherwood, Florence Landing and Midland. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 73 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Southern Acadia; Upper Vermilion
